post.title: ChatGPT removes almost all OpenAI plus guaranteed reasoning
post.excerpt: A user mapped out the OpenAI plus guaranteed reasoning and it turns out it is less than 1/10th of the reasoning per month unless you buy a higher tier of access. He included a nice little diagram. https://x.com/scaling01/status/1953780931552031056?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
